name: 6:00 AM with joe
description:
Night with joe

your forest friend joe wants to play.

have fun with joe or else.

joe is adorable fun little guy :)

Controls 

SPACE- Turn Off flashlight turn on flashlight

Volume- Keep it down or joe will be mad his ears are sensitive.

Keep the volume down or joe will get you use the flashlight to blind joe for a while.

Joe will eat your organs... 

Secret Axolotl find it. :)
